Veratis sat watching his monitors when he saw a spike in one of the
protoforms. "This is amazing, even with your sequencers offline your spark
still fights to return to this plane. I can see why Lunarpine was so
attracted to you. I must study this further." He scanned for more activity.
the protoform he'd placed Shadow Wings spark in was active. her form was
beginning to take shape, even though he'd programmed it to seek out more
compatible DNA. "Lets see just what I can do with you." the old bot adjusted
the controls, and hooked some receptors to the protoform. if it changed any
further he'd know.


----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, October 06, 2000 6:22 AM
Subject: Sparks


> ::Shadow Wing::
>
> She reached out one last time to try to find any presence at all near
> her.  She found one.  It was a faint siganl, but it was something at
> least. She tried to connect to it and make contact. "Hello? Can you
> hear me?" She still had no idea that she was merely a spark in a jar
> that was being fed energy.  All she knew was that her consiousness
> was still alive and that she still had a chance.
>
>
>
>
>
